translations.et: tegema (midagi) (saab olla vaid koos teise sõnaga)
translations.ru: вспомогательный глагол, постпозиционный несвязный глагол делать

meaning_note: Auxiliary verb that cannot be used on its own, but can be combined with some nouns to make a si-verb. Permissible si-verbs are included separately in this dictionary.
